snippet: Mr. Olexa, a truck driver who was the subject of a Vows column in The New York Times, married Angela Sclafani on Aug. 2 and was taken to the hospital the next day.
abstract: Michael Olexa, subject of a recent New York Times Vows column, dies at age 42.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Olexa, a truck driver who was the subject of a Vows column in The New York Times, married Angela Sclafani on Aug. 2 and was taken to the hospital the next day.

headline.seo: Michael Olexa, Newlywed Truck Driver Who Had Cancer, Dies at 42
headline.main: Michael Olexa, Newlywed Truck Driver Who Had Cancer, Dies at 42
headline.print_headline: Michael Olexa, 42, Newlywed Who Had Cancer
